features.name: Authentication (Register/Login)
features.description: User registration and login forms, JWT-based authentication, session management.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Minimalist landing page with navigation to register/login.

features.name: Workflow Editor
features.description: Visual drag-and-drop workflow/node editor with node types, edge management, and configuration.

features.name: Workflow Management
features.description: Create, save, load, and list workflows. Integrates with backend APIs.

features.name: Credentials Management
features.description: Add, edit, delete credentials and assign to tool nodes.

features.name: Execution & Output
features.description: Run workflows, stream output, display execution logs and errors.

features.name: UI/UX & Theming
features.description: Minimalist, responsive, black/white UI with accessibility and error handling.
